channel.title: Simple question
channel.description: i'm tryign to change the experience rate that my knock hay bails and dumies give can some one tell me real quick, and i want my npc's to talk and say my server name so if you could tell me that, that would be great

item.title: Simple question
item.dc:creator: @tim_moughtin tim_moughtin
item.description:
@tim_moughtin wrote:

[quote=“Click Here, post:5, topic:65049”][quote author=tim_moughtin link=topic=94467.msg979090#msg979090 date=1173221233]

i’m tryign to change the experience rate that my knock hay bails and dumies give can some one tell me real quick, and i want my npc’s to talk and say my server name so if you could tell me that, that would be great

also it would be great if you used search, or look in the tuts first.
[/quote] or it would be better if you just didnt post spam + since when does searching in npc.handler just to change what an npc says is a tut? hmmm…[/quote]

i was refering to the search on mopar, they should do a quiz to be able to post.
point taken all the same though

Read full topic

[/quote]

item.title: Simple question
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

go into npc.handler, hold ctrl + f, then search for the npc’s code that you want them to say, once a search has been found, there will say somewhere to enter a user name, put your user name, then below a few lines is a line where you just add what the npc wants to say, once you dont that, save + compile + run then thats it.

Read full topic
